snippet: After four fatalities at Aqueduct’s meet, which opened Dec. 12, the New York State Racing and Wagering Board said necropsies would be performed on all horses that sustain deadly racing injuries.
abstract: New York State Racing and Wagering Board announces that it will order necropsies for all horses that sustain deadly racing injuries on Aqueduct's inner dirt track following four fatalities at the racetrack's meet.
lead_paragraph: After four fatalities at Aqueduct’s meet, which opened Dec. 12, the New York State Racing and Wagering Board said necropsies would be performed on all horses that sustain deadly racing injuries.

headline.seo: Aqueduct Breakdowns Lead to Order for Necropsies
headline.main: Horse Deaths at Aqueduct Stir Action by State Board
headline.print_headline: Horse Deaths at Aqueduct Stir Action by State Board
